response.original_title: Shuku Shukuwe - A Vida é Para Sempre
response.overview: For three times yuxibu sang shuku shukuwe, life is everlasting. It was heard by the trees, the snakes, the crabs. It was heard by all the beings that shed their skins and shells. For three times, yuxibu sang shuku shukuwe. But the inocent was unable to hear him in silence. And life became brief.
response.title: Shuku Shukuwe - A Vida é Para Sempre

crew.name: Agostinho Manduca Mateus Ika Muru Huni Kuin
